mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY NT_NUM ASC) RNUM, NT_NUM, NT_TYPE, NT_TITLE, NT_DATE FROM NOTICE ORDER BY RNUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NT_NUM, NT_TYPE, NT_TITLE, NT_CONTENT, NT_DATE ) VALUES ( NT_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{NT_TYPE}, #{NT_TITLE}, #{NT_CONTENT}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NT_TYPE = #{NT_TYPE}, NT_TITLE = #{NT_TITLE}, NT_CONTENT = #{NT_CONTENT}, NT_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE NT_NUM = #{num}
